item.title: DeFi Still Needs a Silk Road Moment
item.description: _ This article was originally published as an Op-Ed on CoinDesk_ Mainstream criminal adoption would prove that decentralized finance (DeFi) is building tools with real utility, because if there’s any one group that is both underserved in their access to sophisticated financial products and willing to pay huge premiums to acquire them, it’s criminals.Â The Silk Road was launched in February of 2011 and quickly became the first example of Bitcoin’s product-market fit.
